column3: Issue #9518: add code example of AST for TokenTypes.MOD_ASSIGN
column4: Closes: #9518  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/111678724-9c854500-8846-11eb-91ad-ceea74ca0f7e.png)  **Successfully compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/111678828-b45cc900-8846-11eb-8136-d4690f2834b2.png)  ``` **Test.java** λ cat Test.java public class Test {         void test() {                 int a = 5;                 a %= 2;         } }  **AST** λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [2:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:13]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:2]     |       |   |--IDENT -> a [3:6]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:8]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10]     |       |           `--NUM_INT -> 5 [3:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:11]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:4]     |       |   `--MOD_ASSIGN -> %= [4:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [4:2]     |       |       `--NUM_INT -> 2 [4:7]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:8]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:0]  # Printing the code that we care λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "4:"     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:4]     |       |   `--MOD_ASSIGN -> %= [4:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [4:2]     |       |       `--NUM_INT -> 2 [4:7]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:8] ```  ### Expected update for javadoc ``` |--EXPR -> EXPR |   `--MOD_ASSIGN -> %= |       |--IDENT -> a |       `--NUM_INT -> 2 |       |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9514: update example of AST for TokenTypes.METHOD_REF
column4: Closes: #9514 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/113589594-2f97ea80-964f-11eb-828a-4035b574614c.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/113587660-beefce80-964c-11eb-831b-893460160e45.png)  **Test.java** `λ cat Test.java` ``` import java.util.*;  public class Test {         void test() {                 Comparator compare = String::compareToIgnoreCase;         } } ```  **AST** `λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` IMPORT -> import [1:0] |--DOT -> . [1:16] |   |--DOT -> . [1:11] |   |   |--IDENT -> java [1:7] |   |   `--IDENT -> util [1:12] |   `--STAR -> * [1:17] `--SEMI -> ; [1:18] CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [3:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [3:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [3:7] |--IDENT -> Test [3:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [3:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [3:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [4:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [4:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [4:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [4:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [4:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [4:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [4:13]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [5:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [5:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [5:2]     |       |   |   |--IDENT -> Comparator [5:2]     |       |   |   `--TYPE_ARGUMENTS -> TYPE_ARGUMENTS [5:12]     |       |   |       |--GENERIC_START -> < [5:12]     |       |   |       |--TYPE_ARGUMENT -> TYPE_ARGUMENT [5:13]     |       |   |       |   `--IDENT -> String [5:13]     |       |   |       `--GENERIC_END -> > [5:19]     |       |   |--IDENT -> compare [5:21]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [5:25]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [5:33]     |       |           `--METHOD_REF -> :: [5:33]     |       |               |--IDENT -> String [5:27]     |       |               `--IDENT -> compareToIgnoreCase [5:35]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [5:54]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [6:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [7:0] ``` ``` # Printing the code that we care λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "5:" ``` ```     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [5:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [5:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [5:2]     |       |   |   |--IDENT -> Comparator [5:2]     |       |   |   `--TYPE_ARGUMENTS -> TYPE_ARGUMENTS [5:12]     |       |   |       |--GENERIC_START -> < [5:12]     |       |   |       |--TYPE_ARGUMENT -> TYPE_ARGUMENT [5:13]     |       |   |       |   `--IDENT -> String [5:13]     |       |   |       `--GENERIC_END -> > [5:19]     |       |   |--IDENT -> compare [5:21]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [5:25]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [5:33]     |       |           `--METHOD_REF -> :: [5:33]     |       |               |--IDENT -> String [5:27]     |       |               `--IDENT -> compareToIgnoreCase [5:35]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [5:54] ```  ### Expected update for javadoc ```  |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF  |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS  |   |--TYPE -> TYPE  |   |   |--IDENT -> Comparator  |   |   `--TYPE_ARGUMENTS -> TYPE_ARGUMENTS  |   |       |--GENERIC_START -> <  |   |       |--TYPE_ARGUMENT -> TYPE_ARGUMENT  |   |       |   `--IDENT -> String  |   |       `--GENERIC_END -> >  |   |--IDENT -> compare  |   `--ASSIGN -> =  |       `--EXPR -> EXPR  |           `--METHOD_REF -> ::  |               |--IDENT -> String  |               `--IDENT -> compareToIgnoreCase  |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9512: update code example of AST for TokenTypes.METHOD_CALL
column4: Closes: #9512 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/111414904-da7b4f80-8706-11eb-9240-91bb33cd204e.png) ``` **Test.java** λ cat Test.java public class Test {         void test() {                 Integer.parseInt("123");         } }  **AST** λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [2:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:13]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:18]     |       |   `--METHOD_CALL -> ( [3:18]     |       |       |--DOT -> . [3:9]     |       |       |   |--IDENT -> Integer [3:2]     |       |       |   `--IDENT -> parseInt [3:10]     |       |       |--ELIST -> ELIST [3:19]     |       |       |   `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:19]     |       |       |       `--STRING_LITERAL -> "123" [3:19]     |       |       `--RPAREN -> ) [3:24]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:25]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0]  # Printing the code that we care λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "3:"     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:18]     |       |   `--METHOD_CALL -> ( [3:18]     |       |       |--DOT -> . [3:9]     |       |       |   |--IDENT -> Integer [3:2]     |       |       |   `--IDENT -> parseInt [3:10]     |       |       |--ELIST -> ELIST [3:19]     |       |       |   `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:19]     |       |       |       `--STRING_LITERAL -> "123" [3:19]     |       |       `--RPAREN -> ) [3:24]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:25]  ```  ### Expected update for javadoc ```     |--EXPR -> EXPR     |   `--METHOD_CALL -> (     |       |--DOT -> .     |       |   |--IDENT -> Integer     |       |   `--IDENT -> parseInt     |       |--ELIST -> ELIST     |       |   `--EXPR -> EXPR     |       |       `--STRING_LITERAL -> "123"     |       `--RPAREN -> )     |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9511: add code example of AST for TokenTypes.LT
column4: Closes: #9511 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/113738092-393b5400-971c-11eb-8e91-a8d60e4b01fb.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/113738142-45bfac80-971c-11eb-99a1-0dbf47e131bb.png)  **Test.java** `λ cat Test.java` ``` public class Test {         void test() {                 int a = 5, b = 10;                 boolean c;                 c = a < b;         } } ```  **AST** `λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [2:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:13]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:2]     |       |   |--IDENT -> a [3:6]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:8]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10]     |       |           `--NUM_INT -> 5 [3:10]     |       |--COMMA -> , [3:11]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:2]     |       |   |--IDENT -> b [3:13]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:15]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:17]     |       |           `--NUM_INT -> 10 [3:17]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:19]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_BOOLEAN -> boolean [4:2]     |       |   `--IDENT -> c [4:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:11]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:4]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [5:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> c [5:2]     |       |       `--LT -> < [5:8]     |       |           |--IDENT -> a [5:6]     |       |           `--IDENT -> b [5:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [5:11]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [6:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [7:0] ``` ``` # Printing the code that we care λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "5:" ``` ```     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:4]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [5:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> c [5:2]     |       |       `--LT -> < [5:8]     |       |           |--IDENT -> a [5:6]     |       |           `--IDENT -> b [5:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [5:11] ```  ### Expected update for javadoc ```  |--EXPR -> EXPR  |   `--ASSIGN -> =  |       |--IDENT -> c  |       `--LT -> <  |           |--IDENT -> a  |           `--IDENT -> b  |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9510: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.LPAREN
column4: Closes: #9510   ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6259617/114194250-f665c000-9957-11eb-8f39-298aa352ea8d.png)   ``` $ cat Test.java public class Test {      void foo(){         Integer val = new Integer();         while (false) {             val += (-3);         }     }  }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.40-all.jar -t Test.java    CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [3:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [3:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [3:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [3:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [3:13]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [3:13]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:15]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:8]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:8]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:8]     |       |   |   `--IDENT -> Integer [4:8]     |       |   |--IDENT -> val [4:16]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:20]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [4:22]     |       |           `--LITERAL_NEW -> new [4:22]     |       |               |--IDENT -> Integer [4:26]     |       |               |--LPAREN -> ( [4:33]     |       |               |--ELIST -> ELIST [4:34]     |       |               `--RPAREN -> ) [4:34]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:35]     |       |--LITERAL_WHILE -> while [5:8]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:14]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:15]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_FALSE -> false [5:15]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [5:20]     |       |   `--SLIST -> { [5:22]     |       |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [6:16]     |       |       |   `--PLUS_ASSIGN -> += [6:16]     |       |       |       |--IDENT -> val [6:12]     |       |       |       |--LPAREN -> ( [6:19]     |       |       |       |--UNARY_MINUS -> - [6:20]     |       |       |       |   `--NUM_INT -> 3 [6:21]     |       |       |       `--RPAREN -> ) [6:22]     |       |       |--SEMI -> ; [6:23]     |       |       `--RCURLY -> } [7:8]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [8:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [10:0]    ``` expected update for javodoc is:   ``` CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class |--IDENT -> Test `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK     |--LCURLY -> {     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void     |   |--IDENT -> foo     |   |--LPAREN -> (     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS     |   |--RPAREN -> )     |   `--SLIST -> {     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE     |       |   |   `--IDENT -> Integer     |       |   |--IDENT -> val     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> =     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR     |       |           `--LITERAL_NEW -> new     |       |               |--IDENT -> Integer     |       |               |--LPAREN -> (     |       |               |--ELIST -> ELIST     |       |               `--RPAREN -> )     |       |--SEMI -> ;     |       |--LITERAL_WHILE -> while     |       |   |--LPAREN -> (     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_FALSE -> false     |       |   |--RPAREN -> )     |       |   `--SLIST -> {     |       |       |--EXPR -> EXPR     |       |       |   `--PLUS_ASSIGN -> +=     |       |       |       |--IDENT -> val     |       |       |       |--LPAREN -> (     |       |       |       |--UNARY_MINUS -> -     |       |       |       |   `--NUM_INT -> 3     |       |       |       `--RPAREN -> )     |       |       |--SEMI -> ;     |       |       `--RCURLY -> }     |       `--RCURLY -> }     `--RCURLY -> } ```

column3: Issue #9474: add code example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_ELSE
column4: Closes: #9474  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/116272766-ccf1c480-a79e-11eb-8520-4b87fd610b00.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/116272884-ea269300-a79e-11eb-9e65-3e15b3ad468e.png)  **Test.java** `$ cat Test.java` ``` public class Test {  	void test() { 		boolean flag = true; 		if (flag) {  		} else {  		} 	} }  ```  **AST** `$ jjava -jar checkstyle-8.42-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [3:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [3:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [3:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [3:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [3:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [3:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:13]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_BOOLEAN -> boolean [4:2]     |       |   |--IDENT -> flag [4:10]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:15]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [4:17]     |       |           `--LITERAL_TRUE -> true [4:17]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:21]     |       |--LITERAL_IF -> if [5:2]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:5]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:6]     |       |   |   `--IDENT -> flag [5:6]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [5:10]     |       |   |--SLIST -> { [5:12]     |       |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [7:2]     |       |   `--LITERAL_ELSE -> else [7:4]     |       |       `--SLIST -> { [7:9]     |       |           `--RCURLY -> } [9:2]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [10:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [11:0] ```  ``` # Printing the code that we care $ java -jar checkstyle-8.42-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "5:\|7:\|9:" ``` ```     |       |--LITERAL_IF -> if [5:2]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:5]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:6]     |       |   |   `--IDENT -> flag [5:6]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [5:10]     |       |   |--SLIST -> { [5:12]     |       |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [7:2]     |       |   `--LITERAL_ELSE -> else [7:4]     |       |       `--SLIST -> { [7:9]     |       |           `--RCURLY -> } [9:2] ```  ### Expected update for javadoc ```  LITERAL_IF -> if   |--LPAREN -> (   |--EXPR -> EXPR   |   `--IDENT -> flag   |--RPAREN -> )   |--SLIST -> {   |   `--RCURLY -> }   `--LITERAL_ELSE -> else       `--SLIST -> {           `--RCURLY -> } ```

column3: Issue #9472: update code example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_DO
column4: Closes: #9472  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/116349192-1bd64300-a80d-11eb-825d-b1da206203ce.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/116349235-33adc700-a80d-11eb-9f1f-92e1ddb9ca2a.png)  **Test.java** `$ cat Test.java` ``` import java.util.Random;  public class Test {  	void test() { 		Random rand = new Random(); 		int x; 		do { 			x = rand.nextInt(); 		} while (x < 5); 	} } ```  **AST** `$ java -jar checkstyle-8.42-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` IMPORT -> import [1:0] |--DOT -> . [1:16] |   |--DOT -> . [1:11] |   |   |--IDENT -> java [1:7] |   |   `--IDENT -> util [1:12] |   `--IDENT -> Random [1:17] `--SEMI -> ; [1:23] CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [3:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [3:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [3:7] |--IDENT -> Test [3:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [3:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [3:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [5:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [5:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [5:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [5:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [5:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [5:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [5:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [5:13]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [6:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [6:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [6:2]     |       |   |   `--IDENT -> Random [6:2]     |       |   |--IDENT -> rand [6:9]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [6:14]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [6:16]     |       |           `--LITERAL_NEW -> new [6:16]     |       |               |--IDENT -> Random [6:20]     |       |               |--LPAREN -> ( [6:26]     |       |               |--ELIST -> ELIST [6:27]     |       |               `--RPAREN -> ) [6:27]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [6:28]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [7:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [7:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [7:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [7:2]     |       |   `--IDENT -> x [7:6]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [7:7]     |       |--LITERAL_DO -> do [8:2]     |       |   |--SLIST -> { [8:5]     |       |   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [9:5]     |       |   |   |   `--ASSIGN -> = [9:5]     |       |   |   |       |--IDENT -> x [9:3]     |       |   |   |       `--METHOD_CALL -> ( [9:19]     |       |   |   |           |--DOT -> . [9:11]     |       |   |   |           |   |--IDENT -> rand [9:7]     |       |   |   |           |   `--IDENT -> nextInt [9:12]     |       |   |   |           |--ELIST -> ELIST [9:20]     |       |   |   |           `--RPAREN -> ) [9:20]     |       |   |   |--SEMI -> ; [9:21]     |       |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [10:2]     |       |   |--DO_WHILE -> while [10:4]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [10:10]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [10:13]     |       |   |   `--LT -> < [10:13]     |       |   |       |--IDENT -> x [10:11]     |       |   |       `--NUM_INT -> 5 [10:15]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [10:16]     |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [10:17]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [11:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [12:0] ```  ``` # Printing the code that we care $ java -jar checkstyle-8.42-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "8:\|9:\|10:" ``` ```     |       |--LITERAL_DO -> do [8:2]     |       |   |--SLIST -> { [8:5]     |       |   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [9:5]     |       |   |   |   `--ASSIGN -> = [9:5]     |       |   |   |       |--IDENT -> x [9:3]     |       |   |   |       `--METHOD_CALL -> ( [9:19]     |       |   |   |           |--DOT -> . [9:11]     |       |   |   |           |   |--IDENT -> rand [9:7]     |       |   |   |           |   `--IDENT -> nextInt [9:12]     |       |   |   |           |--ELIST -> ELIST [9:20]     |       |   |   |           `--RPAREN -> ) [9:20]     |       |   |   |--SEMI -> ; [9:21]     |       |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [10:2]     |       |   |--DO_WHILE -> while [10:4]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [10:10]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [10:13]     |       |   |   `--LT -> < [10:13]     |       |   |       |--IDENT -> x [10:11]     |       |   |       `--NUM_INT -> 5 [10:15]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [10:16]     |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [10:17] ```  ### Expected update for javadoc ```  LITERAL_DO -> do   |--SLIST -> {   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR   |   |   `--ASSIGN -> =   |   |       |--IDENT -> x   |   |       `--METHOD_CALL -> (   |   |           |--DOT -> .   |   |           |   |--IDENT -> rand   |   |           |   `--IDENT -> nextInt   |   |           |--ELIST -> ELIST   |   |           `--RPAREN -> )   |   |--SEMI -> ;   |   `--RCURLY -> }   |--DO_WHILE -> while   |--LPAREN -> (   |--EXPR -> EXPR   |   `--LT -> <   |       |--IDENT -> x   |       `--NUM_INT -> 5   |--RPAREN -> )   `--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9468: add code example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_CHAR

column3: Issue #9467: add code example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_CATCH
column4: Closes: #9467  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/116351376-33afc600-a811-11eb-8ddc-14433569e474.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/116349235-33adc700-a80d-11eb-9f1f-92e1ddb9ca2a.png)  **Test.java** `$ cat Test.java` ``` import java.io.*;  public class Test {  	void test() { 		try { 			FileReader fr = new FileReader("Test.txt"); 		} catch (FileNotFoundException e) {  		} 	} }  ```  **AST** `$ java -jar checkstyle-8.42-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` IMPORT -> import [1:0] |--DOT -> . column3: Issue #9457: update code example of AST for TokenTypes.LABELED_STAT
column4: Closes: #9457 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/114705636-8f744c80-9d45-11eb-9f92-fbdbd09d2ded.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/114705716-a87cfd80-9d45-11eb-9029-f9cc7f084c66.png)  **Test.java** `λ cat Test.java` ``` public class Test {         void test() {                 int i = 0;                 outer:                 while (i < 10) {                         if (i == 5)                                 continue outer;                         i++;                 }         } } ```  **AST** `λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41.1-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:1]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:1]     |   |--IDENT -> test [2:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:10]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:11]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:13]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:2]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:2]     |       |   |--IDENT -> i [3:6]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:8]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10]     |       |           `--NUM_INT -> 0 [3:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; column3: Issue #9415: Added Example of AST for TokenTypes.DIV
column4: Closes: #9415  ![DIV Proposed Javadoc](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36664705/111179792-69d31680-85d2-11eb-8482-f7eb724485a0.png)  ``` $ javac Tester.java  $ cat Tester.java public class Tester { 	public static void my(int a) { 		a = 4 / 2; 	} }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Tester.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [2:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [2:7] |--IDENT -> Tester [2:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [2:20]     |--LCURLY -> { [2:20]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [3:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:1]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [3:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [3:8]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:15]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [3:15]     |   |--IDENT -> my [3:20]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [3:22]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [3:23]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [3:23]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:23]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:23]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:23]     |   |       `--IDENT -> a [3:27]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [3:28]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:30]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:4]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [4:2]     |       |       `--DIV -> / [4:8]     |       |           |--NUM_INT -> 4 [4:6]     |       |           `--NUM_INT -> 2 [4:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:11]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:0]  Printing a line for the code we care $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Tester.java | grep "4:"     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:4]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [4:2]     |       |       `--DIV -> / [4:8]     |       |           |--NUM_INT -> 4 [4:6]     |       |           `--NUM_INT -> 2 [4:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:11] ``` Expected update for javadoc  ```  |--EXPR -> EXPR  |   `--ASSIGN -> =  |       |--IDENT -> a  |       `--DIV -> /  |           |--NUM_INT -> 4  |           `--NUM_INT -> 2  |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9414: Added Example of AST for TokenTypes.DEC
column4: Closes: #9414  ![DEC JAVADOC](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36664705/111294552-75751a80-8670-11eb-87c0-cca011acae65.png)  ``` $ javac Tester.java  $ cat Tester.java public class Tester { 	public static void my(int a) { 		--a; 	} }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Tester.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [2:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [2:7] |--IDENT -> Tester [2:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [2:20]     |--LCURLY -> { [2:20]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [3:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:1]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [3:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [3:8]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:15]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [3:15]     |   |--IDENT -> my [3:20]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [3:22]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [3:23]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [3:23]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:23]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:23]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:23]     |   |       `--IDENT -> a [3:27]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [3:28]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:30]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:2]     |       |   `--DEC -> -- [4:2]     |       |       `--IDENT -> a [4:4]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:5]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:0]  Printing a line for the code we care $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Tester.java | grep "4:"     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:2]     |       |   `--DEC -> -- [4:2]     |       |       `--IDENT -> a [4:4]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:5] ``` Expected update for javadoc  ```  |--EXPR -> EXPR  |   `--DEC -> --  |       `--IDENT -> a  |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9408: update code example of AST for TokenTypes.CLASS_DEF

column3: Issue #9407: Added Example of AST for TokenTypes.CHAR_LITERAL
column4: Closes: #9407  ![CLIT](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36664705/112047599-8abbde80-8b73-11eb-8c27-8440b38865c3.png)   ``` $ javac Tester.java  $ cat Tester.java public class Tester { 	public static char test() { 		return 'a'; 	} }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Tester.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Tester [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:20]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:20]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:1]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [2:8]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:15]     |   |   `--LITERAL_CHAR -> char [2:15]     |   |--IDENT -> test [2:20]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:24]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:25]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:25]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:27]     |       |--LITERAL_RETURN -> return [3:2]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:9]     |       |   |   `--CHAR_LITERAL -> 'a' [3:9]     |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:12]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0]  Printing a line for the code we care     |       |--LITERAL_RETURN -> return [3:2]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:9]     |       |   |   `--CHAR_LITERAL -> 'a' [3:9]     |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:12] ``` Expected update for javadoc  ```  --LITERAL_RETURN -> return     |--EXPR -> EXPR     |   `--CHAR_LITERAL -> 'a'     `--SEMI -> ;   ```

column3: Issue #9404: Added Example of AST for TokenTypes.BSR
column4: Closes: #9404  ![BSR](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36664705/111985398-94712200-8b32-11eb-9fa5-c8ffdd27d090.png)   ``` $ javac Tester.java  $ cat Tester.java public class Tester { 	public static void test(int a, int b) { 		a >>> b; 	} }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Tester.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Tester [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:20]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:20]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:1]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:1]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:1]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [2:8]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:15]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:15]     |   |--IDENT -> test [2:20]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:24]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:25]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:25]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:25]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:25]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:25]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> a [2:29]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:30]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:32]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:32]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:32]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:32]     |   |       `--IDENT -> b [2:36]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:37]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:39]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:4]     |       |   `--BSR -> >>> [3:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [3:2]     |       |       `--IDENT -> b [3:8]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:9]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:1]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0]  Printing a line for the code we care     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:4]     |       |   `--BSR -> >>> [3:4]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [3:2]     |       |       `--IDENT -> b [3:8]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:9] ``` Expected update for javadoc  ```  |--EXPR -> EXPR  |   `--BSR -> >>>  |       |--IDENT -> a  |       `--IDENT -> b  |--SEMI -> ;   ```

column3: Issue #9399: Updated the example of AST for TokenTypes.BLOCK_COMMENT_BEGIN
column4:
Closes: #9399  ![CheckStyle_PR_photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62554685/112132277-6d792580-8bf0-11eb-8705-0cdef9d84540.png)   ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test {     void block_comment_begin(){         /* Comment content         */     } } ``` AST in CLI for the above Java file:- ``` $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> block_comment_begin [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:28]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:29]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:29]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:30]     |       |--BLOCK_COMMENT_BEGIN -> /* [3:8]     |       |   |--COMMENT_CONTENT ->  Comment content
          [3:10]     |       |   `--BLOCK_COMMENT_END -> */ [4:9]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:0] ``` ``` # printing lines we are concerned with:- $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java | grep "3:\|4:"  |       |--BLOCK_COMMENT_BEGIN -> /* [3:8] |       |   |--COMMENT_CONTENT ->  Comment content
          [3:10] |       |   `--BLOCK_COMMENT_END -> */ [4:9] ``` expected update for javadoc is:- ``` --BLOCK_COMMENT_BEGIN -> /*    |--COMMENT_CONTENT ->  Comment content
    `--BLOCK_COMMENT_END -> */ ``` Hence, updated the code accordingly.

column3: Issue #9397: Added example of AST for TokenTypes.BAND

    } }  $ java com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.Main -t sun_checks.xml Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:13]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:13]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:13]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:13]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:13]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> a [2:17]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:18]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:19]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:19]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:19]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:19]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> b [2:23]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:24]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:25]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:25]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:25]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:25]     |   |       `--IDENT -> c [2:29]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:30]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:32]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:10]     |       |       |--IDENT -> c [3:8]     |       |       `--BAND -> & [3:14]     |       |           |--IDENT -> a [3:12]     |       |           `--IDENT -> b [3:16]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:17]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0]  # Printing a line for the code we care $ java com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.Main -t sun_checks.xml Test.java | grep "3:"     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:10]     |       |       |--IDENT -> c [3:8]     |       |       `--BAND -> & [3:14]     |       |           |--IDENT -> a [3:12]     |       |           `--IDENT -> b [3:16]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:17]  ```  Expected update for javadoc  ```  |--EXPR -> EXPR  |   `--ASSIGN -> =  |       |--IDENT -> c  |       `--BAND -> &  |           |--IDENT -> a  |           `--IDENT -> b  |--SEMI -> ;  ```

column3: Issue #9395: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.ARRAY_INIT
column4: Closes: #9395   ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35426911/111043932-8739a080-846b-11eb-9a23-3bacd392779c.png) ``` $ cat Test.java public class Test {     void foo() {        int[] y =          {           1,           2,          };     } }  $ java com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.Main -t sun_checks.xml Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:13]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:13]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:15]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:10]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:10]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:10]     |       |   |   `--ARRAY_DECLARATOR -> [ [3:10]     |       |   |       |--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:7]     |       |   |       `--RBRACK -> ] [3:11]     |       |   |--IDENT -> y [3:13]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:15]     |       |       `--ARRAY_INIT -> { [4:9]     |       |           |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:10]     |       |           |   `--NUM_INT -> 1 [5:10]     |       |           |--COMMA -> , [5:11]     |       |           |--EXPR -> EXPR [6:10]     |       |           |   `--NUM_INT -> 2 [6:10]     |       |           |--COMMA -> , [6:11]     |       |           `--RCURLY -> } [7:9]     |       |--SEMI -> ; column3: Issue #9390: update example of AST for TokenTypes.ANNOTATION_ARRAY_INIT
column4: Closes: #9390  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/113244866-72666500-92d3-11eb-8c04-5e534775bab9.png)  **Successfully Compiled** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56120837/113041924-2b378180-91b8-11eb-873b-9dd220bfb70b.png)  **Test.java** `λ cat Test.java` ``` @interface Annotation { int[] value() default {3, 4, 5}; }  @Annotation({1, 2}) public class Test {} ``` **AST** `λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java` ``` ANNOTATION_DEF -> ANNOTATION_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |--AT -> @ [1:0] |--LITERAL_INTERFACE -> interface [1:1] |--IDENT -> Annotation [1:11] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:22]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:22]     |--ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF -> ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF [2:3]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:3]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:3]     |   |   `--ARRAY_DECLARATOR -> [ [2:3]     |   |       |--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:0]     |   |       `--RBRACK -> ] [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> value [2:6]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:11]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:12]     |   |--LITERAL_DEFAULT -> default [2:14]     |   |   `--ANNOTATION_ARRAY_INIT -> { [2:22]     |   |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [2:23]     |   |       |   `--NUM_INT -> 3 [2:23]     |   |       |--COMMA -> , [2:24]     |   |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [2:26]     |   |       |   `--NUM_INT -> 4 [2:26]     |   |       |--COMMA -> , [2:27]     |   |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [2:29]     |   |       |   `--NUM_INT -> 5 [2:29]     |   |       `--RCURLY -> } [2:30]     |   `--SEMI -> ; [2:31]     `--RCURLY -> } [3:0] CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [5:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [5:0] |   |--ANNOTATION -> ANNOTATION [5:0] |   |   |--AT -> @ [5:0] |   |   |--IDENT -> Annotation [5:1] |   |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:11] |   |   |--ANNOTATION_ARRAY_INIT -> { [5:12] |   |   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:13] |   |   |   |   `--NUM_INT -> 1 [5:13] |   |   |   |--COMMA -> , [5:14] |   |   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:16] |   |   |   |   `--NUM_INT -> 2 [5:16] |   |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [5:17] |   |   `--RPAREN -> ) [5:18] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [6:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [6:7] |--IDENT -> Test [6:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [6:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [6:18]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:19] ``` ``` # Printing the code that we care λ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "5:" ``` ``` CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [5:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [5:0] |   |--ANNOTATION -> ANNOTATION [5:0] |   |   |--AT -> @ [5:0] |   |   |--IDENT -> Annotation [5:1] |   |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:11] |   |   |--ANNOTATION_ARRAY_INIT -> { [5:12] |   |   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:13] |   |   |   |   `--NUM_INT -> 1 [5:13] |   |   |   |--COMMA -> , [5:14] |   |   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:16] |   |   |   |   `--NUM_INT -> 2 [5:16] |   |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [5:17] |   |   `--RPAREN -> ) [5:18] ``` ### Expected update for javadoc ```  ANNOTATION -> ANNOTATION   |--AT -> @   |--IDENT -> Annotation   |--LPAREN -> (   |--ANNOTATION_ARRAY_INIT -> {   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR   |   |   `--NUM_INT -> 1   |   |--COMMA -> ,   |   |--EXPR -> EXPR   |   |   `--NUM_INT -> 2   |   `--RCURLY -> }   `--RPAREN -> ) ```

column3: Issue: #9373 Add example of AST for TokenTypes.ASSIGN
column4: Closes: #9373  Added The example of AST for TokenTypes.ASSIGN, used the simple assignment example (a = b; ), refer to the image for clarification. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35426911/110784855-33bf2b00-8290-11eb-9007-fec2f9ec4755.png)

column3: Issue #9373: Added Example of AST for TokenTypes.ASSIGN
column4: Closes: #9373 ![Screenshot_TokenTypes_Assign](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/812984/111037133-a8e94800-83d7-11eb-9606-9156b3c51ee1.png)   ``` $ javac Test.java  $   $ cat Test.java  public class Test {     void foo(int a, int b) {       a=b;     } }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.38-all.jar -t Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:13]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:13]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:13]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:13]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:13]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> a [2:17]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:18]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:20]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:20]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:20]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:20]     |   |       `--IDENT -> b [2:24]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:25]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:27]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:7]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:7]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [3:6]     |       |       `--IDENT -> b [3:8]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:9]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0]  # printing a line only for code that we care $ java -jar checkstyle-8.38-all.jar -t Test.java | grep "3:"     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:7]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:7]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [3:6]     |       |       `--IDENT -> b [3:8]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:9]  ```  expected update for javodoc is: ``` |--EXPR -> EXPR |   `--ASSIGN -> = |   |--IDENT -> a |   `--IDENT -> b |--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9271: Remove detailAstImp from Rcurly
column4: Closes: #9271   Continutation of #9288  Interestingly according to GitHub  [renaming](https://github.com/github/renaming/) the PR should automatically get targeted on renaming branch. But didn't happen with this one. It might be targeting PR on this branch and not from this branch.   Sorry for that. Fixed points as pointed in #9288 in recent commit. column3: Issue #9217: Sonar Dashboard link doesn't work
column4: Closes: #9217   $cat log pom.xml  ```        nl.demon.shadowland.maven.plugins       sonarqube-maven-report       0.2.2  ``` Before change URL - `https://sonarcloud.io/project/index/com.puppycrawl.tools:checkstyle` Current URL - `https://sonarcloud.io/dashboard?id=com.puppycrawl.tools%3Acheckstyle` Desired URL - `https://sonarcloud.io/dashboard?id=org.checkstyle%3Acheckstyle`     I am not able to change `com.puppycrawl.tools` with `org.checkstyle`. Kindly comment on how to solve this.

column3: Issue #8905: Add basic SARIF support
column4: Closes: #8905 by providing a basic version of [SARIF](https://docs.oasis-open.org/sarif/sarif/v2.1.0/sarif-v2.1.0.html)  This PR does not include: - Fully update the documentation with SARIF support. - Populating `runs[0].tool.rules` for the actual checkstyle checks that are executed. - Fully integrated relative path support since the basePath can only be set through `Checker` instead of `Main`.  Given that this PR is already a mammoth, I would prefer the rest to be implemented in follow-up PRs.  ## Test I have validated the output at https://sarifweb.azurewebsites.net/Validation This [gist](https://gist.github.com/chao2zhang/8ebff385e0c6e1da4ebbb50024d873fe) is a sample SARIF output that I ran with `java -jar target/checkstyle-8.42-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -c src/main/resources/sun_checks.xml -f=sarif -o=a.sarif src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/S*.java`

column3: Issue #8010: CommentsIndentation false positive for comments in multi…
column4: Closes: #8010   ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test {     String s1 = "ONE", s2 = "TWO", s3 = "THREE";     private final boolean myList = someMethod(         // Some comment here         s1,         s2,         s3         // ok     );      private boolean someMethod(String s1, String s2, String s3) {         return s1.equals(s2) && s1.equals(s3);     } }  $ javac Test.java   $ cat config.xml                                                                       $ java -jar checkstyle-8.42-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -c config.xml Test.java Starting audit... Audit done.   $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41.1-all.jar -c config.xml Test.java      Starting audit... [ERROR] /home/akmo/GitHub/Test/indentation/comment/Test.java:8:9: Comment has incorrect indentation level 8, expected is 4, indentation should be the same level as line 9. [CommentsIndentation] Audit done. Checkstyle ends with 1 errors. ```  Diff Regression config: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AkMo3/akmo3.github.io/master/Indentation/config-Indentation-20210330121805.xml Diff Regression projects: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AkMo3/akmo3.github.io/master/Issue9010/projects-to-test-on.properties

column3: Issue #7618: Update doc for EmptyForIteratorPad
column4: Closes: #7618  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42171790/110675709-36227600-81f9-11eb-9824-58c6e909f2e8.png)  `$ cat config.xml ` ```                ```  `$ cat Hello.java`  ``` import java.util.*;  class Hello {       public static void main(String args[])       {             HashMap mp=new HahMap();             for (Iterator foo =mp.entrySet().iterator();  foo.hasNext(); ); // violation since whitespace             //after semicolon              for (Iterator foo =mp.entrySet().iterator();  foo.hasNext();); // ok                                            } } ```  `$ java -jar checkstyle-8.39-all.jar -c config.xml Hello.java ` ``` Starting audit... [4:29]     |       |               |--LPAREN -> ( [4:16]     |       |               |--EQUAL -> == [4:25]     |       |               |   |--IDENT -> quantity [4:17]     |       |               |   `--NUM_INT -> 1 [4:27]     |       |               |--RPAREN -> ) [4:28]     |       |               |--STRING_LITERAL -> "true" [4:30]     |       |               |--COLON -> : [4:36]     |       |               `--STRING_LITERAL -> "false" [4:37]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:44]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:0]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:0]  Printing a line for the code we care $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T test.java | grep "4:"  |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:0]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:0]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:0]     |       |   |   `--IDENT -> String [4:0]     |       |   |--IDENT -> variable [4:7]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:15]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [4:29]     |       |           `--QUESTION -> ? [4:29]     |       |               |--LPAREN -> ( [4:16]     |       |               |--EQUAL -> == [4:25]     |       |               |   |--IDENT -> quantity [4:17]     |       |               |   `--NUM_INT -> 1 [4:27]     |       |               |--RPAREN -> ) [4:28]     |       |               |--STRING_LITERAL -> "true" [4:30]     |       |               |--COLON -> : [4:36]     |       |               `--STRING_LITERAL -> "false" [4:37]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:44]  Expected update for javadoc  |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF        |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS        |   |--TYPE -> TYPE        |   |   `--IDENT -> String        |   |--IDENT -> variable        |   `--ASSIGN -> =        |       `--EXPR -> EXPR        |           `--QUESTION -> ?        |               |--LPAREN -> (        |               |--EQUAL -> ==        |               |   |--IDENT -> quantity        |               |   `--NUM_INT -> 1        |               |--RPAREN -> )        |               |--STRING_LITERAL -> "true"        |               |--COLON -> :        |               `--STRING_LITERAL -> "false"        |--SEMI -> ;

column3: Issue #9930: Resolved issues with links detected by Linkcheck plugin
column4: Closes #9930  Made changes in links in `src/xdocs` and `RightCurlyCheck.java`.  According to the [Linkcheck reports](https://checkstyle.org/linkcheck.html) as described in #9930 the following links were changes:-  1) For `config_design.html` `property_types.html#pattern` => `property_types.html#Pattern`  2) For `config_javadoc.html` `property_types.html#access_modifiers` => `property_types.html#AccessModifierOption.5B.5D`  3) For `apidocs/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/RightCurlyCheck.html` `https://checkstyle.org/apidocs/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/apidocs/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/api/TokenTypes.html#METHOD_DEF` => `apidocs/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/api/TokenTypes.html#METHOD_DEF`  4) For `config_naming.html` `property_types.html#regexp` => `property_types.html#Pattern`  5) For `releasenotes.html` `config_misc.html#Regexp` => `config_regexp.html#Regexp`  6) For `cmdline.html` `apidocs/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/DefaultLogger .html` => `apidocs/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/DefaultLogger.html`

column3: Sun Style Convention Coverage Update - Blank Spaces
column4: Closes #9843  This updates the blank lines coverage of the sun style convention. Added the test file to the sun test package. Added a reference link to the configuration file lines and the test file. Note: I've only created one test method (whitespaceAroundSimple) as an example, but the same process can be applied to all other methods.  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43009893/114273026-d0ecbb00-9a18-11eb-9088-458f5601509f.png)  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43009893/114273038-dba75000-9a18-11eb-94ed-6aa6ff13c9ad.png)  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43009893/114273060-ecf05c80-9a18-11eb-995c-588c4dc473bc.png)

column3: Issue #9749: update MethodLengthCheckTest.java to use unique Input file in each test method
column4: Closes #9749   I separated the input file that was shared between two test methods inside MethodLengthCheckTest.java file, and I added a // violation comment next to the violation test method.  But the file (InputMethodLengthSimple) contains many things that I don't think is related to the Method Length functionality, it contains things like name format tests, accessor tests, local variables tests, and many others.  So if that should be fixed, should I create an issue with this problem and try to fix, or it's intended to be that way? thank you in advance.

column3: Issue #9595: Update example of AST for TokenTypes.VARIABLE_DEF
column4: Closes #9595  ### Website after update: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58329164/111596420-25729100-87f3-11eb-99d2-bcfe7eaa16ea.png)  ### Source ` $ cat Test.java` ```java public class Test {   private int PI = 3.14; } ```  ### AST ```sh $ java -jar checkstyle-8.40-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -t test.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |   |   `--LITERAL_PRIVATE -> private [3:2]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:10]     |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:10]     |   |--IDENT -> PI [3:14]     |   |--ASSIGN -> = [3:17]     |   |   `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:19]     |   |       `--NUM_FLOAT -> 3.14 [3:19]     |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:23]     `--RCURLY -> } [4:0]  #Relevant AST Nodes for VARIABLE_DEF  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.40-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -t test.java | grep 3:      |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |   |   `--LITERAL_PRIVATE -> private [3:2]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:10]     |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:10]     |   |--IDENT -> PI [3:14]     |   |--ASSIGN -> = [3:17]     |   |   `--EXPR -> EXPR [3:19]     |   |       `--NUM_FLOAT -> 3.14 [3:19]     |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:23] ```  ### Expected update for Javadoc ``` --VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF          |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS            |   `--LITERAL_PRIVATE -> private    |--TYPE -> TYPE                      |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int            |--IDENT -> PI                       |--ASSIGN -> =                       |   `--EXPR -> EXPR                  |       `--NUM_FLOAT -> 3.14         `--SEMI -> ; ```

column3: Issue #9594: update example of AST for TokenTypes.UNARY_PLUS
column4: Closes #9594 ![Capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46570534/111383811-c1ef4300-86ce-11eb-8393-efffda40d99a.JPG)  ``` C:\Users\Hiron\Downloads>more Test.java public class Test {     void foo(int a , int b) {       a = + b;     } }  C:\Users\Hiron\Downloads>java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:13]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:13]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:13]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:13]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:13]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> a [2:17]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:19]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:21]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:21]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:21]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:21]     |   |       `--IDENT -> b [2:25]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:26]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:28]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:8]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:8]     |       |       |--IDENT -> a [3:6]     |       |       `--UNARY_PLUS -> + [3:10]     |       |           `--IDENT -> b [3:12]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:13]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0] ``` expected update for javodoc is: ```   |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:8]   |   `--ASSIGN -> =    |       |--IDENT -> a    |       `--UNARY_PLUS -> +    |           `--IDENT -> b    |--SEMI -> ;  ```

   static {     num = 10;     // Inside Static Initialisation Block   } } ```  ### AST `$ java -jar checkstyle-8.40-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -T Test.java` ```sh CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:18]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:18]     |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:2]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:2]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [3:2]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:9]     |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [3:9]     |   |--IDENT -> num [3:13]     |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:16]     |--STATIC_INIT -> STATIC_INIT [5:2]     |   `--SLIST -> { [5:9]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [6:8]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [6:8]     |       |       |--IDENT -> num [6:4]     |       |       `--NUM_INT -> 10 [6:10]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [6:12]     |       |--SINGLE_LINE_COMMENT -> // [7:4]     |       |   `--COMMENT_CONTENT ->  Inside Static Initialisation Block\n [7:6]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [8:2]     `--RCURLY -> } [9:0] ```  ### Expected Update for Javadoc ``` --VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF                                            |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS                                              |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static                                        |--TYPE -> TYPE                                                        |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int                                              |--IDENT -> num                                                        `--SEMI -> ; column3: Issue #9566: update example of AST for TokenTypes.RPAREN
column4: Closes #9566    ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55190574/115195093-f742e280-a10b-11eb-8da6-38755226f9ca.png) **Rparen.java** ``` public class Rparen{     void check(){         //A right parenthesis is used in check(")"     } } ``` **Cmd console:** ``` E:\GSoC>javac Rparen.java E:\GSoC>java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Rparen.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Rparen [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:19]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:19]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> check [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:14]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:15]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:15]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:16]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0] ``` **Expected update for javodoc** ``` METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF  |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS  |--TYPE -> TYPE  |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void  |--IDENT -> check  |--LPAREN -> (  |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS  |--RPAREN -> )  `--SLIST -> {      `--RCURLY -> } ```

[testTags()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L151) , [testTagsWithResolver()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L182), [testTagsWithSubclassesAllowed()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L269) 2. [testSetterGetterOff()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L357), [testSetterGetterOn()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L364) 3. [testGenerics1()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L421), [testGenerics2()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L434), [testGenerics3()](https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/ebef3bd59fdc2c97587a67bc59d57af6ecbb9072/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/JavadocMethodCheckTest.java#L447)  Duplicate methods have been removed, and only one instance of each of them have been kept.

column3: Issue #9520: update AnnotationUseStyleCheckTest to use unique Input file in each test method
column4: closes #9520

column3: Issue #9517: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.MOD
column4: Closes #9517  ![CheckStyle_MOD_PR_photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62554685/115226067-cd25fc00-a0dc-11eb-8eb5-3b81d8fd7056.png)  ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test{     void foo(int a, int b, int c) {         c = a % b;     } } ``` AST in CLI for the above Java file:- ``` $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:17]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:17]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:13]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:13]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:13]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:13]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:13]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> a [2:17]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:18]     |   |   |--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:20]     |   |   |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:20]     |   |   |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:20]     |   |   |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:20]     |   |   |   `--IDENT -> b [2:24]     |   |   |--COMMA -> , [2:25]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:27]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:27]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:27]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:27]     |   |       `--IDENT -> c [2:31]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:32]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:34]     |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:10]     |       |       |--IDENT -> c [3:8]     |       |       `--MOD -> % [3:14]     |       |           |--IDENT -> a [3:12]     |       |           `--IDENT -> b [3:16]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:17]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0] ``` ``` # printing lines we are concerned with:- $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java | grep "3:" |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:10] |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [3:10] |       |       |--IDENT -> c [3:8] |       |       `--MOD -> % [3:14] |       |           |--IDENT -> a [3:12] |       |           `--IDENT -> b [3:16] |       |--SEMI -> ; [3:17] ``` Expected update for JavaDoc:-  ``` EXPR -> EXPR   `--ASSIGN -> =       |--IDENT -> c       `--MOD -> %           |--IDENT -> a           `--IDENT -> b  SEMI -> ;  ```

column3: Issue #9513: Update example of AST for TokenTypes.METHOD_DEF
column4: Closes #9513  #### Old javadoc  ![Screenshot from 2021-03-18 21-55-28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/69365878/111661126-c46bad00-8834-11eb-85f5-7f244674c308.png)  #### New Javadoc  ![Screenshot from 2021-03-18 21-45-00](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/69365878/111660276-eca6dc00-8833-11eb-9175-81d220bc527c.png)  #### CLI output:  ``` $ cat MyClass.java  public class MyClass {     public static int square(int x)      {          return x*x;      }  }  $ java -jar checkstyle-8.42-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -t MyClass.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> MyClass [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:21]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:21]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [2:11]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:18]     |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:18]     |   |--IDENT -> square [2:22]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:28]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:29]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:29]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:29]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:29]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:29]     |   |       `--IDENT -> x [2:33]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:34]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:5]     |       |--LITERAL_RETURN -> return [4:9]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [4:17]     |       |   |   `--STAR -> * [4:17]     |       |   |       |--IDENT -> x [4:16]     |       |   |       `--IDENT -> x [4:18]     |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [4:19]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:5]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:1]  ``` ####

column3: Issue #9509: Updated example of AST for TokenTypes.LOR
column4: Closes #9509  ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71064674/113858397-524a1080-97c1-11eb-84be-4fddc4408b58.png)  Java code used to generate AST :   class MyClass {     public static void main(String[] args)     {             boolean a = true , b = false;             if(a || b) {                 System.out.println("Prints TRUE");             }     } }    Generated AST :   CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:0] |--IDENT -> MyClass [1:6] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:14]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:14]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [2:11]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:18]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:18]     |   |--IDENT -> main [2:23]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:27]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:34]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:34]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:34]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:34]     |   |       |   `--ARRAY_DECLARATOR -> [ [2:34]     |   |       |       |--IDENT -> String [2:28]     |   |       |       `--RBRACK -> ] [2:35]     |   |       `--IDENT -> args [2:37]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:41]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:4]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:12]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:12]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:12]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_BOOLEAN -> boolean [4:12]     |       |   |--IDENT -> a [4:20]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:22]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [4:24]     |       |           `--LITERAL_TRUE -> true [4:24]     |       |--COMMA -> , [4:29]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:12]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:12]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:12]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_BOOLEAN -> boolean [4:12]     |       |   |--IDENT -> b [4:31]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:33]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [4:35]     |       |           `--LITERAL_FALSE -> false [4:35]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:40]     |       |--LITERAL_IF -> if [5:12]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:14]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:17]     |       |   |   `--LOR -> || [5:17]     |       |   |       |--IDENT -> a [5:15]     |       |   |       `--IDENT -> b [5:20]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [5:21]     |       |   `--SLIST -> { [5:23]     |       |       |--EXPR -> EXPR [6:34]     |       |       |   `--METHOD_CALL -> ( [6:34]     |       |       |       |--DOT -> . [6:26]     |       |       |       |   |--DOT -> . [6:22]     |       |       |       |   |   |--IDENT -> System [6:16]     |       |       |       |   |   `--IDENT -> out [6:23]     |       |       |       |   `--IDENT -> println [6:27]     |       |       |       |--ELIST -> ELIST [6:35]     |       |       |       |   `--EXPR -> EXPR [6:35]     |       |       |       |       `--STRING_LITERAL -> "Prints TRUE" [6:35]     |       |       |       `--RPAREN -> ) [6:48]     |       |       |--SEMI -> ; [6:49]     |       |       `--RCURLY -> } [7:12]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [8:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [9:0]    Expected update for javadoc:       |       |--LITERAL_IF -> if [5:12]     |       |   |--LPAREN -> ( [5:14]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [5:17]     |       |   |   `--LOR -> || [5:17]     |       |   |       |--IDENT -> a [5:15]     |       |   |       `--IDENT -> b [5:20]     |       |   |--RPAREN -> ) [5:21]

column3: Issue #9504: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_VOID
column4: Closes #9504  ![CheckStyle_void_PR_photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62554685/112758855-62424300-8fbe-11eb-962b-9b25d979a986.png)   ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test{     void literal_void(){} } ``` AST in CLI for the above Java file:-  ``` $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:17]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:17]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> literal_void [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:21]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:22]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:22]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:23]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [2:24]     `--RCURLY -> } [3:0] ```  ``` # printing lines we are concerned with:- $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java | grep "2:4\|2:9"  |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4] |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4] |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4] |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4] |   |--IDENT -> literal_void [2:9] ```  expected update for javadoc is:- ``` METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF  |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS  |--TYPE -> TYPE  |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void  |--IDENT -> literal_void ```

column3: Issue #9503: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_TRY
column4: Closes #9503  ![CheckStyle_try_changed_PR_photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62554685/115140463-739ece00-a005-11eb-953b-eeaf5d088973.png)   ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test{     void foo() {         try { } finally {}     } } ``` AST in CLI for the above Java file:- ``` $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:17]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:17]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [2:4]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:9]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:12]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:13]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:13]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:15]     |       |--LITERAL_TRY -> try [3:8]     |       |   |--SLIST -> { [3:12]     |       |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [3:14]     |       |   `--LITERAL_FINALLY -> finally [3:16]     |       |       `--SLIST -> { [3:24]     |       |           `--RCURLY -> } [3:25]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0] ``` ``` # printing lines we are concerned with:- $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java | grep "3:" |       |--LITERAL_TRY -> try [3:8] |       |   |--SLIST -> { [3:12] |       |   |   `--RCURLY -> } [3:14] |       |   `--LITERAL_FINALLY -> finally [3:16] |       |       `--SLIST -> { [3:24] |       |           `--RCURLY -> } [3:25] ``` Expected update for JavaDoc:- ``` LITERAL_TRY -> try   |--SLIST -> {   |   `--RCURLY -> }   `--LITERAL_FINALLY -> finally       `--SLIST -> {           `--RCURLY -> }  ```

column3: Issue #9502: update example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_TRUE
column4: Closes #9502 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43009893/113085425-0b1bb880-91e0-11eb-9ade-e73ea9419003.png) Code used for generating example: ``` mahmoud:/data/checkstyle/checkstyle test$ more Test.java   public class A {     public void b {     	boolean a = true;     } } ``` Output: ``` mahmoud:/data/checkstyle/checkstyle test$ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -t Test.java  CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [2:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [2:7] |--IDENT -> A [2:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [2:15]     |--LCURLY -> { [2:15]     |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [3:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [3:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [3:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [3:11]     |   |   `--LITERAL_VOID -> void [3:11]     |   `--IDENT -> b [3:16]     |--INSTANCE_INIT -> INSTANCE_INIT [3:18]     |   `--SLIST -> { [3:18]     |       |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [4:5]     |       |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [4:5]     |       |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [4:5]     |       |   |   `--LITERAL_BOOLEAN -> boolean [4:5]     |       |   |--IDENT -> a [4:13]     |       |   `--ASSIGN -> = [4:15]     |       |       `--EXPR -> EXPR [4:17]     |       |           `--LITERAL_TRUE -> true [4:17]     |       |--SEMI -> ; [4:21]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [5:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [6:0] ```

column3: Issue #9494: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_STATIC
column4: Closes #9494  ![CheckStyle_4th_PR_photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62554685/113170799-e4c44000-9214-11eb-92dd-11d030e8be7d.png)  Source used to generated AST ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test{     public static int x; } ``` Generated AST ``` $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:17]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:17]     |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [2:11]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:18]     |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:18]     |   |--IDENT -> x [2:22]     |   `--SEMI -> ; [2:23]     `--RCURLY -> } [3:0] ``` ``` # printing lines we are concerned with:- $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java | grep "2:"  |--VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF [2:4] |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4] |   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:4] |   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static [2:11] |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:18] |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:18] |   |--IDENT -> x [2:22] |   `--SEMI -> ; [2:23] ``` Expected update for JavaDoc ``` VARIABLE_DEF -> VARIABLE_DEF   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS   |   |--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public   |   `--LITERAL_STATIC -> static   |--TYPE -> TYPE   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int   |--IDENT -> x   `--SEMI -> ;  ```

column3: Issue #9492: updated example of AST for TokenTypes.LITERAL_RETURN
column4: Closes #9492  ![CheckStyle_return_changed_PR_photo_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62554685/115138516-a7c0c180-9ffa-11eb-89d9-3243b0d1ce9d.png)    ``` $ cat Test.java  public class Test{     public int foo(int i) {         return i+1;     } } ``` AST in CLI for the above Java file:- ``` $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java CLASS_DEF -> CLASS_DEF [1:0] |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [1:0] |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [1:0] |--LITERAL_CLASS -> class [1:7] |--IDENT -> Test [1:13] `--OBJBLOCK -> OBJBLOCK [1:17]     |--LCURLY -> { [1:17]     |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4]     |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4]     |   |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:4]     |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:11]     |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:11]     |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:15]     |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:18]     |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:19]     |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:19]     |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:19]     |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:19]     |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:19]     |   |       `--IDENT -> i [2:23]     |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:24]     |   `--SLIST -> { [2:26]     |       |--LITERAL_RETURN -> return [3:8]     |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:16]     |       |   |   `--PLUS -> + [3:16]     |       |   |       |--IDENT -> i [3:15]     |       |   |       `--NUM_INT -> 1 [3:17]     |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:18]     |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4]     `--RCURLY -> } [5:0] ``` ``` # printing lines we are concerned with:- $ java -jar checkstyle-8.41-all.jar -T Test.java | grep "2:\|3:\|4:"  |--METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF [2:4] |   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:4] |   |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public [2:4] |   |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:11] |   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:11] |   |--IDENT -> foo [2:15] |   |--LPAREN -> ( [2:18] |   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS [2:19] |   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF [2:19] |   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS [2:19] |   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE [2:19] |   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int [2:19] |   |       `--IDENT -> i [2:23] |   |--RPAREN -> ) [2:24] |   `--SLIST -> { [2:26] |       |--LITERAL_RETURN -> return [3:8] |       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR [3:16] |       |   |   `--PLUS -> + [3:16] |       |   |       |--IDENT -> i [3:15] |       |   |       `--NUM_INT -> 1 [3:17] |       |   `--SEMI -> ; [3:18] |       `--RCURLY -> } [4:4] ``` Expected update for JavaDoc:- ``` METHOD_DEF -> METHOD_DEF   |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS   |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC -> public   |--TYPE -> TYPE   |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int   |--IDENT -> foo   |--LPAREN -> (   |--PARAMETERS -> PARAMETERS   |   `--PARAMETER_DEF -> PARAMETER_DEF   |       |--MODIFIERS -> MODIFIERS   |       |--TYPE -> TYPE   |       |   `--LITERAL_INT -> int   |       `--IDENT -> i   |--RPAREN -> )   `--SLIST -> {       |--LITERAL_RETURN -> return       |   |--EXPR -> EXPR       |   |   `--PLUS -> +       |   |       |--IDENT -> i       |   |       `--NUM_INT -> 1       |   `--SEMI -> ;       `--RCURLY -> }  ```
